title: Video: ILLIAL – Quite
body:
This new video from Swedish artist **ILLIAL** is one of the coolest visuals I’ve seen for a while.

The all-slightly-off-white aesthetic and the sheer tenderness of it is strikingly moving – especially when set against the Bon Iver meets How To Dress Well elegance of the track itself. FYI, make sure to watch until the end. Check out _Quite_ below.

Like this? Follow our [On Repeat Playlist](https://open.spotify.com/user/crackintheroad/playlist/1UB6gJIZpmiO0H2zmSbg02) for a handpicked selection of the very best in new music; updated weekly.
